title: Product Listing Load and Display
description: Verify product listing page loads correctly and all product details including images, names, prices, and availability are displayed accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to the product listing page.
Verify product cards are displayed with correct product name, price, image, and availability.
Verify product list updates dynamically as products change.

title: Product Detail Page Display and Reviews
description: Ensure product detail page loads with complete information and user reviews are displayed correctly.

steps.description: Select a product from listing and navigate to product detail page.
Verify product name, description, price, images, and specifications are displayed.
Check that user reviews load and display with correct user ratings and comments.
Test behavior for products with no reviews (display appropriate message).

title: Add Products to Cart and Manage Quantities
description: Verify user can add products to cart, update quantities, and cart updates reflect immediately.

steps.description: From product detail or listing page, add a product to the cart.
Verify product appears in shopping cart with correct quantity and price.
Increase and decrease product quantity in cart.
Verify cart UI updates totals and quantity consistently without errors.
Remove product from cart.
Verify product is removed and cart updates appropriately.

title: Checkout Flow with Razorpay Integration - Successful Payment
description: Test complete checkout flow with valid payment through Razorpay including order creation and payment verification.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout with valid cart items.
Fill in required payment and shipping information.
Submit payment and complete Razorpay payment flow.
Verify order is created successfully and payment verification confirms success.
Confirm order confirmation page is displayed with correct order summary.

title: Checkout Flow - Payment Failure and Error Handling
description: Verify error handling when Razorpay payment fails or is cancelled.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout with items in cart.
Initiate payment and simulate Razorpay payment failure or cancellation.
Verify appropriate error message is displayed to user.
Ensure order is not created or saved in the system.

title: User Profile Personal Info Update
description: Verify user can update personal information in profile and changes persist and display immediately.

steps.description: Navigate to user profile personal info section.
Modify user data such as name, email, contact number.
Save changes.
Verify changes are reflected immediately in UI.
Reload profile page and confirm data persistence.

title: User Address Book Management
description: Verify user can add, edit, and delete addresses in address book section.

steps.description: Access user address book.
Add a new address with all required fields.
Verify the new address appears correctly.
Edit an existing address and save changes.
Verify edited changes are displayed correctly.
Delete an address.
Confirm address is removed from list.

title: Order History Display and Details
description: Ensure user can view order list and detailed order information including invoices and tracking links.

steps.description: Navigate to user order history page.
Verify list of orders is displayed with correct statuses and summaries.
Click on an order to view detailed order information.
Verify order details include product list, prices, shipment tracking, and invoice.
Generate or download invoice.
Verify invoice data is accurate and downloadable.

title: Order Tracking Interface Functionality
description: Validate that the order tracking page shows current order status updates correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to order tracking page.
Select an order with active shipment.
Verify shipment status and tracking updates are displayed and updated dynamically.
Test tracking display for delivered, in transit, and cancelled orders.

title: Security Settings Update and Validation
description: Verify user can update password, enable two-factor authentication and changes take effect securely.

steps.description: Access security settings section in user profile.
Change password providing current and new valid passwords.
Verify password update success message appears and login with new password works.
Enable two-factor authentication using available method.
Verify two-factor authentication is enforced on next login.

title: Dynamic Homepage Content Update via PocketBase
description: Test that admin updates to homepage content via PocketBase reflect correctly on user homepage with caching handled properly.

steps.description: Login as admin or content manager.
Update homepage sections/content using PocketBase management interface.
Verify new content appears on user homepage without downtime.
Confirm caching service updates cache correctly and users receive updated content.

title: SPA Navigation and Routing Responsiveness
description: Verify all SPA routes and navigation menus load views instantly without full page reloads and navigation is responsive on multiple devices.

steps.description: Use navigation menu to access different app sections/pages.
Confirm pages load without full reload and route URL changes accordingly.
Test navigation responsiveness on desktop, tablet, and mobile sizes.

title: Analytics Data Capture and Accuracy
description: Confirm analytics events and page views are tracked correctly and available for review.

steps.description: Trigger user actions like navigation, product views, add to cart, checkout.
Verify analytics events are sent and data matches user actions.
Confirm analytics dashboard or logs reflect accurate, timely data.

title: Local Express Server API Proxy Functionality
description: Test that local Express server endpoints correctly proxy API calls to Razorpay and other external services during development.

steps.description: Make API calls to Razorpay endpoints via local Express server proxy.
Verify requests are forwarded correctly and response data is as expected.
Trigger error responses from Razorpay through proxy.
Confirm errors are handled gracefully and informative messages returned.

title: UI Components Rendering Consistency
description: Verify reusable UI components such as carousel, calendar, toast notifications, and image optimizer render consistently and function correctly across supported browsers and devices.

steps.description: Navigate to pages containing carousel, calendar, toast notifications, and images.
Verify carousel cycles through images smoothly and controls work.
Check calendar supports date selection and displays events correctly.
Trigger toast notifications and verify appearance and dismissal.
Verify images load optimized sizes and resolutions.
Test all components on multiple browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) and devices (desktop, mobile).
